# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

of its usage in the doc string.

```julia
"""
    wrap_string(str, text_width) -> String

Wrap a long string at a given maximum text width.

# Examples

```jldoctest
julia> wrap_string("This is a long sentence.", 10)
"This is \n" * "a long\n" * "sentence."
```
"""
function wrap_string(str, text_width=10)
    # ...
end
```

---
## Hint
* You can use `split` and `join`.
